entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023
